title: [BUG] run example/pytorch/mnist_tensorboard_artifact.py   canâ€™t save pytorch model
body:
I try to add " mlflow.pytorch.save_model(model)"  to example/pytorch/mnist_tensorboard_artifact.py to save model, but  get error like this:
File "mnist_tensorboard_artifact.py", line 170, in <module>
    mlflow.pytorch.save_model(model,"model",pickle_module=None)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/mlflow/pytorch/__init__.py", line 243, in save_model
    torch.save(pytorch_model, model_path, pickle_module=pickle_module, **kwargs)

    pickler.dump(obj)

    return Pickler.dump(self, obj)
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.6/pickle.py", line 409, in dump
    self.save(obj)

    self.save_reduce(obj=obj, *rv)

    self.save(pid, save_persistent_id=False)

    f(self, obj) # Call unbound method with explicit self

    self.save_dynamic_class(obj)

    save(clsdict)

TypeError: can't pickle _thread.lock objects





i try to google this error  but i can't find how to solve it, what should i do to solve it. 
thanks
